prompt: Design a dark-themed notifications page with a sophisticated black background and contrasting elements. Feature a sleek 'Notifications' header in white text with elegant typography. Implement a vertical list of notification items using dark cards with subtle borders and gentle shadows. Each notification should display a circular profile picture with colorful gradients, white text for names and content, and muted gray timestamps. Include red notification badges for unread items and ensure all text maintains proper contrast against the dark background for excellent readability in low-light environments.
